1.0.name: wordpress/personal-chat-room
1.0.description:
Personal Chat Room adds a facility to allow your customers to chat with one another. Here They can questions with another users and can get the answers from another users of your website.

For any bug or report or error or suggetions or feedback, you can post the support

Basically It has the following features : * Add a sidebar button to your site to allow your customers to chat * Add shortcode PERSONAL_CHAT_ROOM to any page or post to activate the plugin * Private Chat (Premium Feature)
